data.title: FAQ – Prepmebuddy
data.text:
Frequently Asked Questions

Master your interviewing skills with PrepMeBuddy and increase your earning potential

For Mock Interviews

What makes PrepMeBuddy different?

We provide very constructive feedback that immediately impacts the candidate’s performance, confidence, and self-portrayal. We do not believe in generic advice: instead, we focus on nuances of tone, word choice, and positioning. We are hands-on and invested in your success!

When should I work with you?

You should work with us if: –

you’ve interviewed for a job that you knew you would be great at, but didn’t get it

interviews make you very nervous

you struggle with open-ended questions

you don’t feel like yourself in an interview setting

you have not had an interview in over a year

What if I am not a good interviewee?

Everyone is and can be a good interviewee – it simply takes practice and self-reflection to build up your confidence. That’s why we’re here If you don’t practice, your nerves tend to take over and detail you. We can help you with building your esteem.

WIll I be interviewed by same expert every time?

After your initial interview with us, the choice of sticking with the same expert or trying someone new is entirely up to you. However, we recommend staying with the same expert to track your progress and enhancements effectively.

Can you create a custom offer depending on my requirements?

Yes. You can contact us on prepmebuddy@gmail.com and we can discuss your requirements further.

Am I able to change my interview time after scheduling it?

You have the option to reschedule your interview, but keep in mind that the availability for your preferred date and time may be limited if the interviewer is already occupied with another interview.

How ahead should I schedule a mock interview?

We recommend scheduling at least 48 hours in advance. This allows us ample time to match you with the right expert based on your needs. However, we'll share our availability calendar with you so you can book according to the slots available.

How do I start?

When you place an order, we’ll require a few items from you in order to look at your candidacy objectively (the job posting, your resume, and your years of experience). Once you complete the order, we will then send you a link to our calendar to book your session and send you a receipt. We’re ready to go!

How many sessions does it take to get good?

It depends. We don’t all start at the same place. I have excellent interviewees who simply want reassurance and we have candidates that can hardly pull together an answer due to their anxiety. We’ll map out your goals and how we’re going to get there, at a speed your comfortable with and is realistic.

What do you mean by cheat sheet?

Well, it would consists of topics/questions that you must know or need to brush up before you sit for any coding or technical interview. (for e.g Coding Cheat Sheet would include approaches on how to find that a given problem is a dynamic programming problem or a sliding window problem), etc.

By when can I expect the link to cheat sheet?

Once you create an order, you will be given a link to the cheat sheet to download you ordered in next 24-48 hours.

Can you also teach System and Product design from scratch?

It depends on our experts availability. Please write to us at prepmebuddy@gmail.com and we will connect with you.

Could you provide coaching or mentoring for my professional development as well?

Absolutely! Our industry experts are equipped to mentor you in a range of areas including leadership, career transitions, and more. Just write to us at prepmebuddy@gmail.com

For Organizations

How can PrepMeBuddy help organizations?

PrepMeBuddy offers a comprehensive end-to-end on-demand interviewing solution for your business. Collaborate with us to access a white-labeled video interviewing platform and receive extensive support for conducting screening interviews tailored to your business requirements. Reach out to us at admin@prepmebuddy.com to explore this further.

I am a new startup and requires your experts help to recruit individuals for my company. Can I connect with you?

Yes. We can help in meeting your technical requirements for hiring. Please write to us at admin@prepmebuddy.com and we will connect with you.
